agenda_items.title:
The Special Called City Council meeting will be held by videoconference and in the Council Chambers, 6th Floor at City Hall.  Individuals who wish to speak in accordance with the City Council Rules of Procedure must sign up with the City Secretaryâ€™s Office.  

The public may to attend the meeting virtually; however, City Hall is available for those wishing to attend the meeting in person.

The following videoconference link is available to the public to listen to the meeting and Office of Communications & Customer Experience/311 will also stream the Special Called City Council meeting on Spectrum Cable Channel 16 and bit.ly/cityofdallastv:

Invocation and Pledge of Allegiance

Special Presentations

Open Microphone Speakers

A resolution (1) adopting of a memorandum of understanding(MOU)/term sheet between the City of Dallas and the Dallas Police and Fire Pension System that incorporates the key provisions of and proposes agreed amendments to the provisions of SB 1527; and (2) authorizing the city manager to execute the MOU/term sheet; or (3) directing city manager to continue to work towards the resolution of any outstanding issues concerning these matters.
agenda_items.description: A resolution (1) adopting of a memorandum of understanding(MOU)/term sheet between the City of Dallas and the Dallas Police and Fire Pension System that incorporates the key provisions of and proposes agreed amendments to the provisions of SB 1527; and (2) authorizing the city manager to execute the MOU/term sheet; or (3) directing city manager to continue to work towards the resolution of any outstanding issues concerning these matters.

agenda_items.title:
Attorney Briefing (Sec. 551.071 T.O.M.A.)

Seeking the advice of the City Attorney regarding:

-	Dallas Police and Fire Pension System v. City of Dallas.
agenda_items.description:
Attorney Briefing (Sec. 551.071 T.O.M.A.)

Seeking the advice of the City Attorney regarding:

-	Dallas Police and Fire Pension System v. City of Dallas.

agenda_items.title:
The above schedule represents an estimate of the order for the indicated briefings and is subject to change at any time. Current agenda information may be obtained by calling (214) 670-3100 during working hours.
Note: An expression of preference or a preliminary vote may be taken by the Council on any of the briefing items.
